==Trivia==
* ''Viramdra'' could correspond with the {{w|Sanskrit}} name ''Virandra'' consisting of ''Vira'' meaning strong, heroic or brave and {{w|Indra}} the king of the {{w|Deva (Hinduism)|Devas}} in {{w|Hinduism}}.
